channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
I have been searching but i dont exactly know what to search for, but anyho.
I want an NPC after its killed to Teleport me to a diffrent spot. How do i do this?
~ BennEh????/

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @The_Box_Noob The Box Noob
item.description:
@The_Box_Noob wrote:

[quote=“Drop A Whip, post:4, topic:200079”]lol That requires 3rd lvl of coding its not easy to do that
even i cant figure it out lol im on second coding 1-2 lvl still
just keep trying stick in there bro!![/quote]

Lmao, its freaking easy…

Search in client.java for

public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID)

if you cant find it try npc handler.

And under neath add this

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == ####) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; teleportToX = ####; // Change coordinates teleportToY = ####; // Change coordinates }

Read full topic
